records.description: FC Midtjylland vs Silkeborg has the highest projected total (4.45) ever in DBU Pokalen history.
FC Midtjylland’s projected 3.21 goals vs Silkeborg is their highest ever.
Silkeborg’s projected 1.24 goals vs FC Midtjylland is their highest ever.
FC Midtjylland vs Silkeborg is the most lopsided projection ever (1.97-goal margin).
Cagliari vs Sassuolo has the highest projected total (2.21) ever in Serie A history.
Cagliari’s projected 1.24 goals vs Sassuolo is their highest ever.
Sassuolo’s projected 0.97 goals vs Cagliari is their highest ever.
Cagliari vs Sassuolo is the most lopsided projection ever (0.27-goal margin).
Sparta Rotterdam vs Groningen has the highest projected total (3.36) ever in KNVB Beker history.
Sparta Rotterdam’s projected 1.69 goals vs Groningen is their highest ever.
Groningen’s projected 1.67 goals vs Sparta Rotterdam is their highest ever.
Sparta Rotterdam vs Groningen is the most lopsided projection ever (0.02-goal margin).
Pisa vs Lazio has the highest projected total (1.30) ever in Serie A history.
Pisa’s projected 0.58 goals vs Lazio is their highest ever.
Lazio’s projected 0.72 goals vs Pisa is their highest ever.
Pisa vs Lazio is the most lopsided projection ever (0.14-goal margin).
FC Nordsjaelland vs Brondby has the highest projected total (2.46) ever in DBU Pokalen history.
FC Nordsjaelland’s projected 1.36 goals vs Brondby is their highest ever.
Brondby’s projected 1.10 goals vs FC Nordsjaelland is their highest ever.
FC Nordsjaelland vs Brondby is the most lopsided projection ever (0.26-goal margin).
